guide.p0: An NPC (Non-Player Character) is any character you encounter and interact with that is not controlled by other human players — they are generated and controlled by the game server.
guide.p1: Player type NPCs are often gives quests while villager type NPCs are merchants. You can interract with them with right click.

merchant.p0: Merchants are NPCs which you can buy and sell items from. There are 5 types of merchants: weaponsmith, armorsmith, storage keeper, tool merchant and magical item merchant. You can sell items to and convert coins from all types of merchants.

p1.part1: Apart from the basic sell and convert coin operations, you can buy weapons and enchant items. See

p2.part1: Apart from the basic sell and convert coin operations, you can buy armors & shields and enchant items. See

merchant.p3: Apart from the basic sell and convert coin operations, you can open your storages. There are 4 types of storages: personal, guild, bazaar, premium.
merchant.p4: Apart from the basic sell and convert coin operations, you can buy gathering tools and utility items.
merchant.p5: Apart from the basic sell and convert coin operations, you can buy potions.
